themes: need for experienced leadership and panelists in literary arts
concerns about irregular scoring and review safeguards
demand for increased transparency in funding processes
desire for extended multi-year funding for organizational growth
key_phrases: Experienced leadership and panelists in literary arts
A safeguard system for review when scores are irregular
more transparency in the process from design to implementation
extended multi-year funding (longer than 2 years for Thrive) for small to medium-sized organizations growing to institution status
barriers_identified: irregular scoring during the panel process
lack of transparency in the process
insufficient duration of multi-year funding for organizational growth
solutions_proposed: Appoint experienced leadership and panelists in literary arts
Implement a safeguard system for review when scores are irregular
Increase transparency from design to implementation
Extend multi-year funding beyond 2 years for small to medium-sized organizations in the Thrive program
